summary: Delightfully comic exploration of the emotional and social geography of an art-house film director.
cast: Kim Tae-Woo|Ji-won Uhm|Hyun-Jung Go|Hyeong-jin Kong|Do-rim Choi|Chang-gyoon Go|Jung-woo Ha|Seon-hyeong Hwang|Jong-seok Kim|Yeon-su Kim|Geum-rak Lee|Jong-mu Lee|Chang-gil Moon|Su-min Park|Michael Wayne Rogers|Young-hwa Seo|Joon-Sang Yoo|Eun-sil Yu|Jung Yu-mi
title: Jal al-ji-do mot-ha-myeon-seo
